title: AdhereTech External API
description: An API designed to expose AdhereTech server's data to clients and other services.

isActive.name: isActive
isActive.description: Flag that indicates if bottle is active.

remindersActive.name: remindersActive
remindersActive.description: Flag that indicates if reminders are active.

onBottleLights.name: onBottleLights
onBottleLights.description: Flag that indicates if visual alarms are active.

onBottleSounds.name: onBottleSounds
onBottleSounds.description: Flag that indicates if auditory alarms are active.

feedbackActive.name: feedbackActive
feedbackActive.description: Flag that indicates if feedback requests are active.

patientUid.name: patientUid
patientUid.description: The ID of the patient using this bottle.

page.name: page
page.description: Current front-end page number; required for pagination.

itemsPerPage.name: itemsPerPage
itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'uid' ascending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of bottles filtered by status and/or patient(s).
Get a bottle by its UID.
Modify a bottle by its UID.

programName.name: programName
programName.description: A string to search within the program's name.

contactMethod.name: contactMethod
contactMethod.description: The contact method used to reach the patient (phone, sms or email).

page.name: page
page.description: Current front-end page number; required for pagination.

itemsPerPage.name: itemsPerPage
itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'uid' ascending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of patients filtered by their values.

bottleUids,.name: bottleUids,
bottleUids,.description: Comma separated list of bottleUids for this bottle. Removing from this list will remove it from the patient. Adding bottles must be done through Bottle endpoint

methods.description: Add a new patient to the database.
Get a patient by UID.
Modify a Patient using a patient UID number.
Delete a patient by UID.

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: effective endDate for disenrollment (default is now). Dates in future not allowed. (UTC).

notes.name: notes
notes.description: notes to include with disenrollment action

200.description: Patient found and disenrolled. All bottles and reminders disabled

400.description: Patient not found. Or patient already disenrolled. Or invalid parameter

methods.description: Disenroll a patient by UID.

notes.name: notes
notes.description: Notes to be included with reenrollment event

404.description: Patient not found. Or patient already enrolled

methods.description: Reenroll a patient.

page.name: page
page.description: Current front-end page number; required for pagination.

itemsPerPage.name: itemsPerPage
itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'timesent' descending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get all active (scheduled but unsent) feedback requests for a patient.
Add a new feedback request for a patient.
Delete all active feedback requests for a patient.
Get a feedback request by its ID.
Modify a feedback request by its ID.
Delete a feedback request by ID.

programName.name: programName
programName.description: A string to search within the program's name.

programDescription.name: programDescription
programDescription.description: A string to search within an program's description.

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: The start date for the date range filter. It filters by only returning programs which were or should be active in the given date range.

endDatetime.name: endDatetime
endDatetime.description: The end date for the date range filter. It filters by only returning programs which were or should be active in the given date range.

patientUids.name: patientUids
patientUids.description: Filters programs so that the results include only programs with the given patients (semicolon separated list).

page.name: page
page.description: Current front-end page number; required for pagination.

itemsPerPage.name: itemsPerPage
itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'name' ascending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of programs filtered by their values.
Add a new program to the database.
Get a program by programName.
Modify a program by programName.
Delete a program by programName.

role.name: role
role.description: User's permission roles as a comma separated String.

page.name: page
page.description: Current front-end page number; required for pagination.

itemsPerPage.name: itemsPerPage
itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'username' ascending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of users filtered by their values.
Add a new user to the database.
Get a user by username.
Modify a user using its username.
Delete a user by username.

bottleReadingId.name: bottleReadingId
bottleReadingId.description: The ID of the bottle reading.

checkinType.name: checkinType
checkinType.description: The type of check-in for this reading.

startDatetime.name: startDatetime
startDatetime.description: The start date for the date range filter. It filters by receivedDateTime.

endDatetime.name: endDatetime
endDatetime.description: The end date for the date range filter. It filters by receivedDateTime.

batteryLevel.name: batteryLevel
batteryLevel.description: The numerical representation of the battery level.

batteryStatus.name: batteryStatus
batteryStatus.description: The text representation of the battery status.

cellServiceLevel.name: cellServiceLevel
cellServiceLevel.description: The numerical representation of the cell signal level.

cellServiceStatus.name: cellServiceStatus
cellServiceStatus.description: The text representation of the cell signal status.

page.name: page
page.description: Current front-end page number; required for pagination.

itemsPerPage.name: itemsPerPage
itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'timereceived' descending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of bottle readings filtered by status, bottle or date.

bottleReadingId.name: bottleReadingId
bottleReadingId.description: The ID of the bottle reading.

reminderSent.name: reminderSent
reminderSent.description: If a reminder was sent for this dose.

doseStatus.name: doseStatus
doseStatus.description: The status of the dose (missed, early, ontime).

startDatetime.name: startDatetime
startDatetime.description: Start date for the date range filter.

endDatetime.name: endDatetime
endDatetime.description: End date for the date range filter.

itemsPerPage.description: Current front-end items per page value; required for pagination.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Attribute(s) and order(s) to sort by in the following example format - "uid desc, timeoccurred asc" etc. Attribute names are case-sensitive. Omit to sort by 'timerecorded' descending as default.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of doses filtered by status, bottle, patient or date.

eventType.name: eventType
eventType.description: The type of event to select.

startDatetime.description: The start date for the date range filter. It filters by timeOccurred.

endDatetime.name: endDatetime
endDatetime.description: The end date for the date range filter. It filters by timeOccurred.

methods.description: Get a list of events.

Add a new event subscription.

alertType.name: alertType
alertType.description: The type of alert to select.

priority.name: priority
priority.description: minimum priority for filtering. The request will return every alert with a priority higher than this number.

startDatetime.name: startDatetime
startDatetime.description: The start date for the date range filter. It filters by timeOccurred.

endDatetime.name: endDatetime
endDatetime.description: The end date for the date range filter. It filters by timeOccurred.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of alerts.
Get a specific alert.
Modify an alert record.
Get the available types of server alerts.
Get search results for a query.

startdateBefore.name: startdateBefore
startdateBefore.description: The maximum start date for the date range filter.

startdateAfter.name: startdateAfter
startdateAfter.description: The minimum start date for the date range filter.

enddateBefore.name: enddateBefore
enddateBefore.description: The maximum end date for the date range filter.

enddateAfter.name: enddateAfter
enddateAfter.description: The minimum end date for the date range filter.

400.description: Incomplete or invalid pagination or sort parameters.

methods.description: Get a list of pauses.

endnow.description: Set true to end an active pause.

documentation.title: AdhereTech External API
documentation.content: An API designed to expose AdhereTech server's data to clients and other services.
